announcement_body.headline: You Can't Kill Victor
announcement_body.body:
[h3]Hero Spotlight: Victor[/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45164767/5f17579aa198931ee073ad9540e2b044b80ea333.png[/img]
A man who walks the line between life and death. Victor has learned to harness pain into power, shocking himself with [i]Jumpstart[/i] to get his adrenaline rushing and his faulty heart pumping. He welcomes incoming damage with open (albeit mismatched) arms, channeling it into his [i]Pain Battery[/i] and granting enemies a taste of the pain he endures. Get too close and risk getting caught in his [i]Aura of Suffering[/i], but hey, at least you'll be suffering together! And [i]just[/i] when you think you've taken him down... Think again. - [i]'They don't have what it takes to kill me.'[/i]


With Victor joining us today in the Cursed Apple, that concludes the rollout of our Six Hero Update. Thank you to everyone for participating in voting, we have loved seeing all the discourse and heart-felt campaigns for your favorite heroes over the last two weeks.


[b]Quick Voting Stats:[/b]
[list]
[*] Nearly 6 million votes were cast in total by the community
[*] The highest number of votes cast by an individual player was 203
[*] Billy won with the largest lead at just over 30% of the total votes at the time of his release
[*] The Doorman and Paige was the closest contest, with only a 0.85% difference in favor of The Doorman
[/list]

announcement_body.headline: Drifter Emerges from the Shadows
announcement_body.body:
[h3]Hero Spotlight: Drifter[/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45164767/effac101dabe092cef4b6eacc2fe486de845816f.png[/img]
Something ancient has arrived in New York... a nameless horror known only as the Drifter. Relentless as time, as certain as death, once Drifter sets his eyes on a victim there's nothing they can do to stop him. They can try to run, but his [i]Bloodscent[/i] drives him forward, leading him to isolated prey. Even if they manage to escape it doesn't matter, as [i]Stalker's Mark[/i] allows Drifter to appear right behind his enemies before lunging in for the kill with a vicious [i]Rend[/i]. Soon [i]Eternal Night[/i] comes, and a faint whistling in the breeze will be joined by a chorus of screams. - [i]'Everyone's got weaknesses, but mercy ain't one of mine.'[/i]


You'll be able to find the Drifter lurking right behind you in games starting today. We'll be back here on Friday at 2pm PDT for the conclusion of our hero update with the release of Victor. See you then!

events.jsondata:
{
	"localized_subtitle": [
		"So much to read, so little time.",
		"So viel zu lesen, so wenig Zeit.",
		"Tant de livres à lire, mais si peu de temps à y consacrer !",
		"Così tanto da leggere in così poco tempo.",
		"읽고 싶은 건 많은데, 시간이 부족하네.",
		"Tantos libros y tan poco tiempo.",
		"要读的东西太多，读书的时间太少。",
		null,
		"Так много книг, так мало времени.",

		"読みたい本は山ほどあるのに、時間が足りません。",

		"Tyle do przeczytania, a czasu tak mało.",
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		"Tolik knih a tak málo času.",

announcement_body.headline: Paige Writes Her Own Story
announcement_body.body:
It's Monday, and today we're excited to announce the next hero joining us in the Cursed Apple is...

[h3]Hero Spotlight: Paige[/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45164767/32461f95d508f369b02dd703d0a9c254c037bb34.png[/img]
Citizens of Manhattan will learn to appreciate the power of the written word when Paige joins the fight. With the mere toss of a book she can [i]Conjure Dragons[/i] that sear enemies who get too close, or bind them to the ground with [i]Captivating Read[/i]. Waning allies will find themselves emboldened by [i]Defend and Fight[/i], granting them the courage to fight another day. Fantasy becomes reality with [i]Rallying Charge[/i], summoning an entire cavalry to gallop across the city. - [i]'We can't wait to see how this story plays out.'[/i]


Your votes will decide if Drifter or Victor will be joining us on Wednesday at 2pm PDT, we'll see you then!

events.jsondata:
{
	"localized_subtitle": [
		"You called, he answered...",
		"Stets zu Diensten, wenn Sie eine helfende Hand brauchen …",
		"Vous avez appelé, il a répondu…",
		"Lo avete chiamato in causa e lui ha risposto...",
		"그대의 부름에, 도어맨이 응답했습니다...",
		"La atención al cliente es lo primero.",
		"您呼叫了，他回应了……",
		null,
		"Вы звали, он прибыл...",
		"เรียกเมื่อไหร่ มาเมื่อนั้น...",
		"あなたの呼び出しに、彼が応えてくれました…",
		null,
		"Wzywaliście, a on odpowiedział…",
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		"Vyžádali jste si ho, a tak je tady...",
		null,
		"Talebiniz alındı...",
		"Vocês chamaram, e ele veio...",
		null,
		null,
		null,

announcement_body.headline: The Doorman, at your Service
announcement_body.body:
[h3]Hero Spotlight: The Doorman[/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45164767/c92f11d8ea510f5eea50f229f2ad06a0e56ba708.png[/img]
He's proper, he's polite, but the humble Doorman of The Baroness Hotel is more than meets the eye. A brisk ring of his [i]Call Bell[/i] leaves nearby enemies disoriented, and his high-speed [i]Luggage Cart[/i] knocks them right off their feet. Do you find yourself getting lost easily in the streets of Manhattan? Don't worry, The Doorman is here to provide a shortcut with his [i]Doorway[/i] whenever the need arises. And only the most [u]special[/u] of enemies get to experience the trip of a lifetime to [i]The Baroness Hotel[/i]. - [i]Please, stay as long as you'd like.[/i]


You can check out The Doorman in game now. Keep your votes coming over the weekend as our next hero will be released on Monday August 25th at 2pm PST.

events.jsondata:
{
	"localized_subtitle": [
		"The votes are in! The next hero to be joining us in the Cursed Apple is Billy!",
		"Der Gewinner steht fest. Der nächste Held im Cursed Apple heißt Billy!",
		"Les votes sont comptabilisés ! Le prochain occultiste qui rejoindra la Pomme perdue est Billy !",
		"I voti parlano chiaro. Il prossimo eroe che si unisce a noi nella Mela maledetta è Billy!",
		"투표 결과가 나왔습니다! 저주받은 사과에 합류할 다음 영웅은 빌리입니다!",
		"¡La votación ha concluido! ¡El siguiente héroe en llegar a la Manzana Maldita es Billy!",
		"投票结果揭晓！ 下一位加入诅咒纽约城的英雄是比利！",
		null,
		"Голоса подсчитаны! Следующим к героям Проклятого Яблока присоединяется Билли!",
		"ผลโหวตออกมาแล้ว! ฮีโร่คนถัดไปที่จะมาร่วมวงกับเราในนครเดอะ​เคิร์ส​แอปเปิลก็คือ \"บิลลี่\"!",
		"ヒーロー投票の結果発表！ カースド・アップルに登場する次のヒーローは、ビリー！",
		null,
		"Głosy zostały podliczone! Kolejnym bohaterem dołączającym do nas w Przeklętym Jabłku jest Billy!",
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		null,
		"Hlasy byly sečteny, a nám je ctí oznámit, že dnes se odemyká hrdina Billy!",

		null,
		null,

		"¡Ya se contaron los votos!  ¡El próximo héroe que se nos unirá en la Manzana Maldita es Billy! ",
		null,
		null,
		"Semua vote sudah terkumpul! Hero selanjutnya yang akan bergabung bersama kita semua di kota Cursed Apple adalah Billy!"

announcement_body.headline: Billy Comes in Swinging
announcement_body.body:
The votes are in! Today we are excited to announce that the next hero joining us in the Cursed Apple is... Billy!

[h3]Hero Spotlight: Billy[/h3]
[img src="{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45164767/6155ec51cb83504f4649748ee9be6cce27920329.png"][/img]
A white hot ball of rage, furious at the very notion of... something. Billy is a chaotic front-liner who never backs down from a challenge. With [i]Rising Ram[/i] he gets up close and personal, before slamming down with [i]Bashdown[/i] to create shockwaves through his enemies. Running isn't even an option when Billy can use his ultimate [i]Chain Gang[/i] to grapple enemies and pull them back in. A quick swig from his bottle gets him [i]Blasted[/i], and his enemies totally wrecked. - [i]'The hell are you staring at, buddy?'[/i]

Keep your votes coming. The next hero will be released at 2pm PST on Friday. See you then!
